title: Alpha Sydney Competitive team LF Analyst

embed.description: Gyazo lets you instantly grab the screen and upload the image/GIF to the web. You can easily share them on Chat, Twitter, Blog, Tumblr, etc. Available for Windows, Mac and Linux.

body: With the recent recruitment of both teams to the Alpha Sydney roster, we are looking for an analyst to work alongside our coach to fully maximise the potential of our team 1. As our main competitive team is all of a high calibre of players, high diamond/master tier rank, we expect the same quality from the analyst. Requirements for the position include experience, a will to be dedicated and to be able to adapt. If you are interested in the position please contact myself either by replying directly to this thread, or add my ign ASYD Doss and we will be able to talk further about the role.
